p: To determine whether Ae. aegypti (six populations) or Ae. albopictus (four populations) were more likely to sustain ZIKV outbreak in Central Africa, the ability of the virus to replicate and disseminate were examined at 14 and 21 dpe as well as ZIKV particles secreted in saliva (only at 21 dpe) (Figs 2 and 3).
